001.comments: VISA 390 001 will be delivered 100% online, with some synchronous (i.e., "real time") and some asynchronous components. If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist, VISA 390 01W. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

002.comments: Pre-req: 6 credits of 200-level VISA with an average of 72%. If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.
002.building: Ponderosa Commons East - Audain Art Centre/Spruce

01W.comments: VISA 390 01W is a waiting list for VISA 390 001. Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration date.

02W.comments: VISA 390 02W is a waiting list for VISA 390 002. Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration date.

description: Seminar-based studio focusing on performance and actions in the field of contemporary art.
